pages.title: Lightning
pages.text: $(bold)TYPE:$() $(l:mechanics/spells_types)Projectile$() $(br)$(bold)COST: $(spell) + $(#AC8C0B)End Rod$()$(br)$(bold)MAX LEVEL:$() $(#green)1$()$(br)$(bold)XP COST:$() $(#green)18$()$(br2)$(italic)''A powerful combat spell, upon being struck by a lightning projectile and the spell succeeds, the spell will strike you with a bolt of lighting''$()

When you cast $(#AC8C0B)$(bold)Lightning$(), a charged projectile will be cast from the scroll. $(br2)Once the $(#AC8C0B)$(bold)Lightning$() hits a player or a block, it will strike lightning where they stand. $(br2)This will cause major damage in a matter of seconds! $(br2)$(bold)Tip: $(italic)The scroll is a one-time use.$()
